DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether study drug safe effective treatment dysfunctional uterine bleeding .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study Treatment Dysfunctional Uterine Bleeding
DOC.detailed_description: The study previously post Schering AG , Germany . Schering AG , Germany rename Bayer HealthCare AG , Germany . Bayer HealthCare AG , Germany sponsor trial .
DOC.criteria: Women 18 year old And diagnosis dysfunctional uterine bleeding without organic pathology And least one follow symptom : prolong , frequent excessive bleeding . The use steroidal oral contraceptive , drug could alter oral contraception metabolism prohibit study . Women history endometrial ablation dilatation curettage within 2 month prior study start exclude .
